DANA CORP DCN> AND UNIT DOWNGRADED BY MOODY'S

Moody's Investors Service Inc said it downgraded 700 mln dlrs of debt of Dana Corp and its unit Dana Credit Corp. Cut were the parent's senior debt and industrial revenue bonds to A-3 from A-2. Moody's reduced to Prime-2 from Prime-1 the commercial paper of Dana and its credit unit. Moody's cited deterioration in capital structure and debt protection measurements due to aggressive balance sheet management. Moreover, Dana's financial leverage rose to 43 pct from 22 pct in 1984 and may climb even more after completing its ongoing stock repurchase program, Moody's said. Reuter
